timeline.bodyText:
nit: the indentation is not easy to read now...One idea is
: Optional.of(
      buildQueryInfo(
            sourceQuery.getControlConfiguration(),
............
But that's just my personal way. Feel free to keep the current approach if you see fit.

replies.bodyText:
Unfortunately IntelliJ auto-formats to the following if buildQueryInfo is on the next line:
skipControl
    ? Optional.empty()
    : Optional.of(
    buildQueryInfo(
        sourceQuery.getControlConfiguration(),
        sourceQuery.getControlQuery(),
        controlChecksumQueryContext,
        control,
        controlQueryContext)),
replies.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: Moving the ternary operator to the end of the line and indentation works better.
replies.author: caithagoras
